name: Inception: The Birth of an Idea
description: In 2010, some passionate programmers had a big idea. They wanted to make a fun challenge for students to learn coding and get excited about it. So, they started planning a contest to do just that.

name: Grow: Getting More People Involved
description: By 2015, the contest had gained popularity, attracting more participants and sponsors. The increased involvement led to a broader range of challenges, enhancing the learning experience for everyone.

name: Change: Make Things Better
description: In 2020, the contest underwent significant improvements, incorporating new technologies and innovative challenges. This transformation ensured the event remained engaging and relevant in an evolving digital landscape.
